title: Online Food Delivery Website
description: Platform where customers effortlessly navigate through categorized menus, explore items using convenient filters, and seamlessly add selections to their carts. With integrated login, registration, and checkout functionalities, it ensures a smooth and satisfying ordering process from start to finish.

title: Anime Generator
description: Anime Generator web application that fetches and displays random anime images and artist names from an API. It uses HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create an interactive interface with a button that, when clicked, retrieves and shows an anime image and artist information.

title: Resume Creator
description: Resume Creator web application that allows users to input their resume details, and then generate and preview a formatted resume. It uses HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to switch between input form and resume preview, with the option to print the resume.
